typedef struct Stack {
	int* array;
	int top;
	int capacity;
} Stack;

void StackInit (
	Stack* pst,  
	int capacity = 4  // è®¾ç½®ç¼ºçœå€¼ä¸º4ï¼ˆé»˜è®¤å®¹é‡ä¸º4ï¼‰
	) 
{
	pst->array = (int*)malloc(sizeof(int) * capacity);
	pst->top = 0;
	pst->capacity = capacity;
}


int main()
{
	Stack st;
	StackInit(&st);   // ä¸çŸ¥é“æ ˆæœ€å¤šå­˜å¤šå°‘æ•°æ®ï¼Œå°±ç”¨ç¼ºçœå€¼åˆå§‹åŒ–

	return 0;
}
